## **26189680 | AvivRegev | Cell | 2015** 
### **Overview**
**PMID**: 26189680<br />
**Model**: Bone marrow derived dendritic cells (BMDCs)<br />
**Treatment**: Tumor necrosis factor (TNF) high<br />
**Control**: Tumor necrosis factor (TNF) low<br />
**Type**: Sorting <br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in mouse bone marrow derived dendritic cells (BMDCs) and sorted with TNF high vs. TNF low conditions. Positive values indicate genes whose knockout can increase TNF protein expression level.<br />

## **28723893 | WNicholasHaining | Nature | 2017 | GVAX+aPD1**
### **Overview**
**PMID**: 28723893<br />
**Model**: B16F10 (murine skin melanoma cell line)<br />
**Treatment**: Irradiated tumour cell vaccine (GVAX) + anti-PD1 in wild type mice<br />
**Control**: TCRa-/- (knockout) mice<br />
**Type**: In-vivo<br />
**Description**: In-vivo CRISPR screen in transplantable tumours in mice treated with immunotherapy (GVAX + anti-PD1). Negative values indicate genes whose knockout can enhance the efficacy of anti-PD1 mediated tumor killing.<br />

**Treatment**: After CRISPR screen, BJAB cells were sorted two rounds with high level MHC-I-specific W6/32 antibody.<br />
**Control**: Sorted with low level MHC-I-specific antibody.<br />
**Type**: Sorting<br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in human diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) TMD8 cells and sorted with MHC-I high vs. MHC-I low conditions. Positive values indicate genes whose knockout can increase MHC-I protein expression level.<br />
